cn.title: 比特派云钱包发放 ETHW 空投的公告

message.data: 比特派云钱包已于2022年9月21日发放 ETHW 的空投，符合条件的用户可以在比特派APP-云钱包内查看并提现。

en.title: Announcement of Bitpie Cloud Wallet Completed Distribution of ETHW Tokens

message.data: The Bitpie Cloud Wallet has completed distribution of Ethereum Proof-of-Work (ETHW) Tokens on September 21, 2022. Eligible users can confirm and withdraw under the Bitpie APP - Cloud Wallet.
